items.headline: Callaway Golf is selling off most of Topgolf on the cheap — and ditching the name
items.summary_en: The Callaway golf company is selling off 60% of its stake in its Topgolf business at a significantly discounted valuation, and changing its name back to what it was before the business was purchased.
